name: Scholar Burst
description:
2-4 Joycon + mouse needed!

Controls

Joystick:Move

X/→:Jump

A/↓:Fall down from platform

B/←:Melee attack (Slap book)

Y/↑:Range attack (Throw book)

+/-:Pause/Resume

Find it hard too study? Don't worry! It's time to SMASH the books into your friends' faces to teach them! The one who get everybody "Graduate" would win an award of the best teacher!

You are the expert to pour your own knowledge directly into others heads! 

Watch out! Burst happens immediately when one of the score bars which is not belongs to you reaches 100!
